DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate efficacy safety ALS-L1023 tablet patient abdominal obesity metabolic syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study ALS-L1023 Patients With Abdominal Obesity Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Aged 20 64 year ( Both gender ) 2 among component metabolic syndrome Triglyceride > = 150mg/dL HDLD : Women < 50mg/dL Men < 40mg/dL Hypertension : Systolic blood pressure > = 130mmHg Diastolic blood pressure > = 85mmHg Hyperglycemia : fasting plasma glucose > = 100 mg/dL Informed consent award Alcohol drug abuse Any investigational medication precede 3 month
